title: Tiny Titans, Volume 2: Adventures in Awesomeness
description: The all-ages tales of the DC Universe's best sidekicks continue! Check out what life is like for the very young heroes of Sidekick Elementary as they head into space, get their report cards, transform into monkeys, fall in love and more in this new graphic novel.These all-ages tales from the DC Universe, beautifully written and illustrated by Art Baltazar and Franco, will entertain new readers and seasoned fans of comics with their playful, innocent stories!Collecting: Tiny Titans 7-12
author: Art Baltazar
